sentences.en: Every day, a plane arrives to ferry guests to and from Bird Island Lodge.
sentences.cn: 每天，一架飞机到达以运送进出鸟岛宾馆的客人。

sentences.en: Ferry boats ply regularly between all the resorts on the lake.
sentences.cn: 渡船定时往返于湖的各旅游景点.

sentences.en: Ferry companies are providing extra sailings from Calais.
sentences.cn: 渡船公司加开了从加来出发的航班。

sentences.en: Ferry services operate between the islands and the mainland.
sentences.cn: 在大陆和各岛之间有轮渡服务.

sentences.en: He stowed away on a ferry and landed in North Shields.
sentences.cn: 他偷乘渡船到了北希尔兹。

sentences.en: I left my bag of film on the  ferry.
sentences.cn: 我把装底片的旅行袋遗放在渡船上.

sentences.en: It is windy today,so it would be difficult to put the ferry boat across.
sentences.cn: 今天刮风，要摆渡到对岸不容易。

sentences.en: Now turn right to follow West Ferry Road.
sentences.cn: 现在向右拐沿西渡路往前走。

sentences.en: She left Hongkong and took the ferry to Kowloon.
sentences.cn: 她离开香港,摆渡来到九龙.

sentences.en: She was going to Nanaimo to catch the ferry to the mainland.
sentences.cn: 她准备去纳奈莫乘渡船回大陆。

sentences.en: The ferry cut merrily through the water.

sentences.cn: 渡船拦腰撞上了我们的船。

sentences.en: The ferry service has restarted after an interval of 12 years.
sentences.cn: 时隔12年之后，轮渡服务又重新开通了。

sentences.en: The ferry service of bygone days has been replaced by that tunnel.
sentences.cn: 往日的渡口已被那个隧道取代.

sentences.en: The ship was used to ferry supplies to Russia during the war.
sentences.cn: 这艘船在战时被用来往俄罗斯 运送补给。

sentences.en: The typhoon sank a ferry, drowning over 200 people.
sentences.cn: 那场台风使一条渡船沉没, 淹死200多人.

sentences.en: They had recrossed the River Gambia by ferry.
sentences.cn: 他们乘渡船再次穿过冈比亚河。
